Before we start, there are 3 things to note about this event! Note 1: Not all characters in this story is important. Don’t worry too much about how many characters there are. There’s only 2-3 real important characters. Note 2: Every roll can only be made by 1 person who represents your team. If they fail, then the whole team will fail so delegate your rolls wisely and try to get everyone to pitch in! I will keep track of your health and if it goes to zero, you won't be able to play the game in the next area, but you can still interact and rp. You can play the games in the area after. Note 3: There will be instances where you will be presented with choices. You have to choose one for the entire team. This will allow you to unlock one info at the cost of the others, so choose wisely.
